# Tidio
> Tidio is a customer support software suite comprising live chat, chatbot, AI chatbot (AI agent), help desk, and ticketing features. Tidio integrates with websites, ecommerce platforms (such as Shopify and WooCommerce), communications channels (such as Facebook Messenger, Instagram, and WhatsApp), and other tools to provide automated, enhanced customer service.


Learn more about the Tidio customer service platform:


## About Tidio
- [Tidio Homepage](https://www.tidio.com/)
- [About Tidio](https://www.tidio.com/about/): Learn about Tidio, the B2B SaaS company behind customer service software.
  - [About Lyro](https://www.tidio.com/blog/lyro-conversational-ai/): Meet Lyro, the AI agent for customer service
- [Tidio Pricing](https://www.tidio.com/pricing/): See how much Tidio costs.
  - [Tidio Premium Plans](https://www.tidio.com/tidio-premium/): Find out more about Tidio Premium.

- [Log In](https://www.tidio.com/panel/login): Log into your Tidio account.

## Features
- [All Features Overview](https://www.tidio.com/features/)


### Core Features 
- [Lyro](https://www.tidio.com/ai-agent/): AI agent for customer service and conversational AI chatbot
- [Flows](https://www.tidio.com/flows/): Automation and rule-based chatbot builder
- [Help Desk](https://www.tidio.com/help-desk/): Help desk software
- [Live Chat](https://www.tidio.com/live-chat/): Live chat software for websites
- [Ticketing System](https://www.tidio.com/ticketing/)


### Additional Features
- [Analytics Dashboard](https://www.tidio.com/analytics/)
- [Team Departments Feature](https://www.tidio.com/departments/)
- [Visitors List Tool](https://www.tidio.com/visitors-list/)
